Class MaxEntModelW

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.MaxEntModelW
public class MaxEntModelW extends Object
Maximum Entropy (MaxEnt) model of profiles of S/U composition and transition probabilities along BKHS chains when BKHS is represented with a mixture of chain lengths.

  • Constructor Summary

    POST-PUBLICATION CONVENIENCE CONSTRUCTOR.

  • Constructor Details

    • MaxEntModelW

      public MaxEntModelW(String outF, int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu, String inDir)
      Constructs a MaxEnt model for BKHS chains with a mixture of chain lengths. Saves MaxEnt individual species abundances to a *.pind.res file.
      Parameters:
      outF - Prefix for output files.
      lmin - Smallest chain length.
      lmax - Largest chain length.
      sigma - Spread of chain lengths.
      mu - Average chain length.
      inDir - Input directory.

    • MaxEntModelW

      public MaxEntModelW(String outF, int lmin, int lmax, double sigma, double mu, String inDir, double massThreshold)
      POST-PUBLICATION CONVENIENCE CONSTRUCTOR. Optimized to filter species by cumulative mass threshold to reduce file size for version control. Saves filtered MaxEnt individual species abundances to a *.pind.res file.
      Parameters:
      outF - Prefix for output files.
      lmin - Smallest chain length.
      lmax - Largest chain length.
      sigma - Spread of chain lengths.
      mu - Average chain length.
      inDir - Input directory.
      massThreshold - Cumulative abundance threshold (e.g., 0.999).

  • Method Details

    • makeProf

      public static void makeProf(String inDir, String pref)
      Reads a *.pind.res file containing MaxEnt abundances and saves profiles of composition and transition probabilities.
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory (ends with "/").
      pref - Prefix for output files.

    • completeSeq

      public static int[] completeSeq(int[] seq, int lmax)
      Elongates an integer sequence to length lmax by padding the start with -1.
      Parameters:
      seq - Integer sequence to elongate.
      lmax - Target length.
      Returns:
      Elongated sequence.

    • revertSeq

      public static int[] revertSeq(int[] seq)
      Inverts the order of an integer sequence.
      Parameters:
      seq - Integer sequence to invert.
      Returns:
      Inverted sequence.

    • makeSig35

      public static void makeSig35(String inDir, String outDir)
      Saves individual species abundances for sigma = 3.5.
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
      outDir - Output directory.

    • makeSig35Filtered

      public static void makeSig35Filtered(String inDir, String outDir)
      POST-PUBLICATION CONVENIENCE METHOD. Saves individual species abundances for sigma = 3.5 with cumulative mass filtering (0.9999).
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
      outDir - Output directory.

    • makeSig15

      public static void makeSig15(String inDir, String outDir)
      Saves individual species abundances for sigma = 1.5.
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
      outDir - Output directory.

    • makeSig15Filtered

      public static void makeSig15Filtered(String inDir, String outDir)
      POST-PUBLICATION CONVENIENCE METHOD. Saves individual species abundances for sigma = 1.5 with cumulative mass filtering (0.9999).
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
      outDir - Output directory.

    • glAndRholAndProfExamples

      public static void glAndRholAndProfExamples(String inDir, String outDir)
      Saves chain length distributions and profiles for the original full files.
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
      outDir - Output directory.

    • glAndRholAndProfExamplesFiltered

      public static void glAndRholAndProfExamplesFiltered(String inDir, String outDir)
      POST-PUBLICATION CONVENIENCE METHOD. Saves distributions and profiles for the filtered files (suffix "F").
      Parameters:
      inDir - Input directory.
      outDir - Output directory.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point for the MaxEnt mixed length modeling.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments.
